languages.text: С великой осторожностью бесчувственные тела Ульфара Громогласного и Лорд-капитана доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи.
With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.
languages.original_text: С великой осторожностью бесчувственные тела Ульфара Громогласного и Лорд-капитана доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи.

traits.locale_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.
With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.
With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.
With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

languages.text: 士兵们把不省人事的乌尔法·雷狼与舰长大人小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: 士兵们把不省人事的乌尔法·雷狼与舰长大人小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。

languages.text: 細心の注意を払いながら、感覚のないウルファー・サンダーラングとロード・キャプテンの身体をシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: 細心の注意を払いながら、感覚のないウルファー・サンダーラングとロード・キャプテンの身体をシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。

languages.text: Con sumo cuidado, los cuerpos demacrados de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán son llevados a las lanzaderas y, sin perder tiempo, devueltos a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Con sumo cuidado, los cuerpos demacrados de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán son llevados a las lanzaderas y, sin perder tiempo, devueltos a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos.

languages.text: Les corps inconscients d'Ulfar et {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} sont transportés jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramenés à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Les corps inconscients d'Ulfar et {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} sont transportés jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramenés à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents.

languages.text: Mit großer Vorsicht werden die leblosen Körper von Ulfar Donnerlunge und dem Lord Captain zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Mit großer Vorsicht werden die leblosen Körper von Ulfar Donnerlunge und dem Lord Captain zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht.

languages.text: Bilinci kapalı Ulfar Tufanciğer ile Lord Kaptan'ın bedenleri dikkatle mekiklere taşınıyor, acilen tedavi edilebilmeleri için hiç zaman kaybetmeden gemiye götürülüyor.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate bodies of Ulfar Thunderlung and the Lord Captain are borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Bilinci kapalı Ulfar Tufanciğer ve Lord Kaptan'ın bedenleri dikkatle mekiklere taşındı ve hiç zaman kaybetmeden acil tedavi alabilmeleri için gemiye götürüldü.
